title: The Bachelorette's Angie Kent takes swipe and insists she's 'not a dry humping sort of girl'
text:
The Bachelorette's Angie Kent has taken a swipe at Bachelor Matt Agnew and contestant Abbie Chatfield after the pair made headlines for their steamy beach rendezvous on the show.

Speaking to The Sun-Herald, the 29-year-old blonde warned viewers that she isn't a fan of 'dry humping' on camera.

'While I'm all about saying 'wait and see' I can definitely say you won't see any dry humping,' the former Gogglebox star said.

Taking a swipe? The Bachelorette's Angie Kent, 29, has insisted that she's 'not a dry humping sort of girl'... after THAT steamy beach rendezvous between Bachelor Matt Agnew and Abbie Chatfield

'I'm not a dry humping sort of girl - on national television, anyway.'

She added: 'I like to save that kind of thing for the privacy of my own home.'

Meanwhile in an interview with 10 Daily earlier this week, Angie spoke about what she learned from Matt Agnew's season of The Bachelor.

Remember this? Matt Agnew and Abbie Chatfield made headlines for their steamy beach date on The Bachelor just weeks ago

She said her biggest fear is watching the show back, now she's finally found happiness.

'I'm going to see a lot of stuff that I probably wish I saw in the moment, and I only get to see it now,' she said.

'So that's probably one thing where I was like, wow.... him [Matt] watching that, he never would've known what the girls were talking about, and that's what's going to happen to me.'

Following in his footsteps! Meanwhile in an interview with 10 Daily earlier this week, Angie spoke about what she learned from Matt Agnew's season of The Bachelor

Despite her fears, Angie has confirmed she is still very much in a relationship with the winner of the show, after filming commenced weeks ago.

Speaking to OK! magazine, the blonde confirmed she is 'very, very happy' with her new man.

The Bachelorette premieres Wednesday, October 9 at 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: The Bachelorette's Angie Kent has taken a swipe at Bachelor Matt Agnew and contestant Abbie Chatfield after the pair made headlines for their steamy beach rendezvous on the show.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
